name: Purifying Light
description: Summon an expanding beam of pure sunlight to doom an enemy, dealing 1161 Magic Damage to them and copying all their damage taken from you for 6 seconds and releasing 50% of it as additional Magic Damage to them.  Maximum copied damage: 3150. This value is based on your Spell Damage.  When the effect ends you and allies near the enemy are healed for 674 Health every 2 seconds for 6 seconds.
effectLines: When the effect ends, a pool of sunlight remains attached to the enemy, healing you and allies.
